item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:

6. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (372 points | 551 comments)

8. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (115 points | 18 comments)
9. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (220 points | 67 comments)
10. No Nat November: My Month Without IPv4 (29 points | 6 comments)
11. The Tube Computer (153 points | 47 comments)
12. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (79 points | 17 comments)
13. Gratitude despite the odds (21 points | 2 comments)
14. Making AWS News stupid fast with smart caching (6 points | discuss)

23. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (128 points | 154 comments)
24. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
25. EstyJS 2.0 (emulator for the Atari ST, written in 100% pure JavaScript) (44 points | 9 comments)
26. Show HN: Book and change flights with one email (66 points | 29 comments)
27. Show HN: Kurdle – Wordle Meets Japanese Kanji (11 points | 2 comments)
28. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (20 points | discuss)
29. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (7 points | 1 comment)
